user_profile.name: Emily Johnson
user_profile.description: Emily is a 22-year-old college student majoring in Business Administration. With her analytical personality and professional language style, she finds herself navigating the complexities of medication management for her busy lifestyle. Despite her novice tech experience, she recognizes the importance of setting medication reminders to maintain her health amidst her very urgent time constraints.

instructions.dialogue: Express only basic needs, let the assistant ask questions.
instructions.profile: Gradually reveal your profile information throughout the conversation.
instructions.hidden_state: Express moderate emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Setting reminders for daily medication in a public setting
Quickly adjusting reminders due to time constraints
Visual reminders that can be easily seen in a crowded environment
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Mobile app store or online market
additional_requirements: Ability to sync with calendar apps
